Package com.merendabot.university.polls

Interface Poll

All Known Implementing Classes:
PollClass
public interface Poll

    Gets the description of the poll.

  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message getMessage()
      Gets the original message that holds the poll information. This is the message that is going to be updated once the poll ends.
      Returns:
      A Message Object containing the poll original message.

    • getDescription

      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the poll. Example: Do you agree with pinable on pizza?
      Returns:
      A String with the message of the poll

    • getEndDate

      java.time.LocalDateTime getEndDate()
      Get the date and time at which the poll with end. Beware that the poll may end sooner if a majority vote is met.
      Returns:
      A LocalDateTime Object with the poll end date and time

    • getOwner

      net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User getOwner()
      Gets the "owner" of the poll. The owner is the person who started the poll.
      Returns:
      A User Object containing the owner of the poll.

    • hasVoteFrom

      boolean hasVoteFrom​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
      Checks if the given user already voted in the poll.
      Parameters:
      user - A User Object
      Returns:
      True if user has voted, False otherwise.

    • getVotesFor

      int getVotesFor()
      Get the number of favourable votes.
      Returns:
      The number of favorable votes.

    • getVotesAbstain

      int getVotesAbstain()
      Get the number of abstaining votes. Abstaining votes do not count for poll approval or rejection.
      Returns:
      The number of abstaining votes.

    • getVotesAgainst

      int getVotesAgainst()
      Get the number of unfavourable votes.
      Returns:
      The number of unfavourable votes.

    • getVoteCount

      int getVoteCount()
      Get the total number of votes.
      Returns:
      The total number of votes.

    • hasMajority

      boolean hasMajority​(int member_count)
      Checks if poll has reached a majority vote.
      Parameters:
      member_count - The number of members to check for majority
      Returns:
      True if poll has reached a majority, False otherwise.

    • isApproved

      boolean isApproved()
      Checks if poll was approved.
      Returns:
      True if approved, False otherwise.

    • isDraw

      boolean isDraw()
      Checks if poll was a draw.
      Returns:
      True if poll is a draw, False otherwise.

    • isClosed

      boolean isClosed()
      Checks if the poll is closed. A closed poll does not accept new votes.
      Returns:
      True if is closed, False otherwise.

    • isRejected

      boolean isRejected()
      Checks if poll was rejected.
      Returns:
      True if rejected, False otherwise.

    • voteFor

      void voteFor​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
      Registers a favourable vote from a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The voting user

    • voteAbstain

      void voteAbstain​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
      Registers an abstaining vote from a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The voting user

    • voteAgainst

      void voteAgainst​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
      Registers an unfavourable vote from a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The voting user

    • closePoll

      void closePoll()
